org.jlinalg
Class MatrixMultiplication

java.lang.Object
  org.jlinalg.MatrixMultiplication

public class MatrixMultiplication
extends java.lang.Object

This includes some different methods of multiplying two matrices.

Author:
Andreas Keilhauer, Marco Bodrato

strassenOriginal

public static <RE extends IRingElement<RE>> Matrix<RE> strassenOriginal(Matrix<RE> m1,
                                                                        Matrix<RE> m2)
The original Strassen-Algorithm for matrix-multiplication using 7 multiplications and 18 additions (or subtraction) in one recursion. Runtime: O(n^(log_2 7)) (appromximately: O(n^(2.807) )

Type Parameters:
RE - the type of the elements in the matrix
Parameters:
m1 -
m2 -
Returns:
m1 multiplied by m2
Throws:
InvalidOperationException

The Algorithm of Strassen-Winograd for matrix-multiplication using 7 multiplications and 15 additions (or subtractions) in one recursion. Runtime: O(n^(log_2 7)) (appromximately: O(n^(2.807) )

strassenBodrato

public static <RE extends IRingElement<RE>> Matrix<RE> strassenBodrato(Matrix<RE> m1,
                                                                       Matrix<RE> m2)
The Algorithm of Strassen-Bodrato for matrix-multiplication using 7 multiplications and 15 additions (or subtractions) in one recursion. Runtime: O(n^(log_2 7)) (appromximately: O(n^(2.807) ) If the two operands coincide (squaring), 4 of 7 multiplications are themselves squarings, and 4 additions (subtractions) are saved.

See A Strassen-like matrix multiplication suited for squaring and highest power computation (written 12/24/08 by Marco Bodrato)

Type Parameters:
RE - The type of the returned value
Parameters:
m1 - First operand
m2 - Second operand
Returns:
m1 multiplied by m2
Throws:
InvalidOperationException

strassenBodratoHelper

private static <RE extends IRingElement<RE>> Matrix<RE> strassenBodratoHelper(Matrix<RE> m1,
                                                                              Matrix<RE> m2)
